select c.content, i.itemtitle, i.itemcost, i.itemwish, i.itemimg1, i.itemview, i.itemno from common c, member m, item i, (SELECT * FROM wish WHERE id =#{id}) w where c.mcd = m.locno and i.itemno = w.itemno and i.id = m.id and m.id in (select id from item where itemno in (select itemno from wish where id =#{id}))
